exams.name: CIC Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: This exam assesses your ability to assign accurate codes for diagnoses and procedures in the inpatient hospital setting, covering ICD-10-CM and ICD-10-PCS.

exams.name: CIC Certification Exam
exams.description: This exam assesses your ability to assign accurate codes for diagnoses and procedures in the inpatient hospital setting, covering ICD-10-CM and ICD-10-PCS.

exams.name: COC Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: Test your knowledge of outpatient coding, including CPT, ICD-10-CM, and HCPCS Level II, as it applies to hospital outpatient departments and ambulatory surgery centers.

exams.name: COC Certification Exam
exams.description: Test your knowledge of outpatient coding, including CPT, ICD-10-CM, and HCPCS Level II, as it applies to hospital outpatient departments and ambulatory surgery centers.

exams.name: CPMA Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: Demonstrate your skills in medical auditing and compliance. This exam covers documentation guidelines, coding standards, and risk analysis for the AAPC CPMA credential.

exams.name: CPMA Certification Exam
exams.description: Demonstrate your skills in medical auditing and compliance. This exam covers documentation guidelines, coding standards, and risk analysis for the AAPC CPMA credential.

exams.name: CRC Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: This exam validates your expertise in risk adjustment (HCC) models. It tests your ability to link diagnoses to chronic conditions for accurate risk score calculation.

exams.name: CRC Certification Exam
exams.description: This exam validates your expertise in risk adjustment (HCC) models. It tests your ability to link diagnoses to chronic conditions for accurate risk score calculation.

exams.name: CPB Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: Prove your proficiency in all aspects of medical billing, including claim processing, denials management, and compliance. Aligns with the AAPC CPB certification standards.

exams.name: CPB Certification Exam
exams.description: Prove your proficiency in all aspects of medical billing, including claim processing, denials management, and compliance. Aligns with the AAPC CPB certification standards.

exams.name: ICD-10-CM Proficiency Exam Practice
exams.description: An in-depth assessment of your ability to accurately use the ICD-10-CM code set for diagnosis coding across various healthcare settings. Perfect for validating your specialized skills.

exams.name: ICD-10-CM Proficiency Exam
exams.description: An in-depth assessment of your ability to accurately use the ICD-10-CM code set for diagnosis coding across various healthcare settings. Perfect for validating your specialized skills.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Certification Practice
exams.description: Master the principles of risk adjustment coding. This exam evaluates your ability to accurately assign ICD-10-CM codes to reflect patient health status for proper reimbursement.

exams.name: Risk Adjustment Certification
exams.description: Master the principles of risk adjustment coding. This exam evaluates your ability to accurately assign ICD-10-CM codes to reflect patient health status for proper reimbursement.

exams.name: CCS Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: Showcase your advanced skills in classifying medical data from patient records, particularly in hospital settings. Prepares you for the rigorous AHIMA CCS credential.

exams.name: CCS Certification Exam
exams.description: Showcase your advanced skills in classifying medical data from patient records, particularly in hospital settings. Prepares you for the rigorous AHIMA CCS credential.

exams.name: Medical Billing Certification Practice
exams.description: Validate your expertise in the entire medical billing process, from patient registration and claim submission to payment posting and collections. Ideal for aspiring billing specialists.

exams.name: Medical Billing Certification
exams.description: Validate your expertise in the entire medical billing process, from patient registration and claim submission to payment posting and collections. Ideal for aspiring billing specialists.

exams.name: CCA Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: Demonstrate your competency in coding patient data across all settings, including hospitals and physician practices. A crucial step towards achieving your AHIMA CCA certification.

exams.name: CCA Certification Exam
exams.description: Demonstrate your competency in coding patient data across all settings, including hospitals and physician practices. A crucial step towards achieving your AHIMA CCA certification.

exams.name: CPC Certification Exam Practice
exams.description: This comprehensive exam tests your mastery of CPT, HCPCS Level II, and ICD-10-CM coding for physician services. Prove your readiness for the official AAPC CPC credential.

exams.description: This comprehensive exam tests your mastery of CPT, HCPCS Level II, and ICD-10-CM coding for physician services. Prove your readiness for the official AAPC CPC credential.

certificateTemplates.name: Default Practice Certificate
certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Proficiency
certificateTemplates.body: This certifies that {candidateName} has successfully demonstrated proficiency in the {examName} practice exam, achieving a score of {finalScore}%.

certificateTemplates.name: Default Completion Certificate
certificateTemplates.title: Certificate of Achievement
certificateTemplates.body: This is to certify that {candidateName} has successfully completed the rigorous requirements of the {examName} and is hereby awarded this certificate upon achieving a passing score of {finalScore}%.

suggestedBooks.title: Official CPC® Certification Study Guide
suggestedBooks.description: AAPC's Official CPC® Certification Study Guide is the ultimate resource for aspiring Certified Professional Coders. This comprehensive guide covers all critical topics tested in the CPC exam, including medical terminology, anatomy, coding guidelines, and compliance. Packed with practice scenarios, coding exercises, and expert tips, it simplifies complex concepts to build confidence and ensure exam success. Ideal for both self-study and classroom use, this guide is a must-have for anyone pursuing a career in medical coding. #CPC #Certification #MedicalCoding #ExamPrep #AAPC

suggestedBooks.title: Buck’s ICD-10-CM for Physicians
suggestedBooks.description: Buck's ICD-10-CM for Physicians is a trusted, physician-focused codebook designed to streamline diagnostic coding in clinical settings. Updated with the latest ICD-10-CM codes, this manual includes detailed descriptions, coding tips, and clinical examples tailored to physician practices. Its user-friendly layout, color-coded tables, and anatomical illustrations make it an essential tool for accurate coding, compliance, and reimbursement in outpatient and inpatient settings. #ICD10 #DiagnosticCoding #PhysicianCoding #MedicalCoding #Compliance

suggestedBooks.title: AMA CPT® Professional
suggestedBooks.description: The AMA CPT® Professional codebook is the definitive resource for mastering Current Procedural Terminology (CPT) coding. Published by the American Medical Association, it provides the most up-to-date CPT codes, detailed descriptions, and guidelines for accurate procedure coding. With clinical examples, coding tips, and modifiers, this spiral-bound edition is perfect for coders, billers, and healthcare providers seeking to ensure compliance and optimize revenue cycle management. #CPT #ProcedureCoding #MedicalCoding #AMA #RevenueCycle

suggestedBooks.title: HCPCS Level II Professional
suggestedBooks.description: The HCPCS Level II Professional guide is an indispensable resource for coding supplies, equipment, and non-physician services. This comprehensive manual offers clear explanations of HCPCS Level II codes, including durable medical equipment, drugs, and ambulance services. With updated codes, modifiers, and regulatory guidance, it’s designed for coders and billers aiming to navigate the complexities of Medicare and other payer requirements with confidence. #HCPCS #MedicalCoding #Billing #Medicare #SuppliesCoding

suggestedBooks.title: Medical Billing & Coding For Dummies
suggestedBooks.description: Medical Billing & Coding For Dummies is the perfect entry point for beginners looking to break into the healthcare industry. This easy-to-read guide demystifies the essentials of medical billing and coding, covering CPT, ICD-10, and HCPCS codes, as well as reimbursement processes. With practical examples, step-by-step instructions, and real-world scenarios, it’s an ideal resource for students, career changers, or anyone seeking a clear introduction to the field. #MedicalBilling #MedicalCoding #Beginner #HealthcareCareers #ForDummies

suggestedBooks.title: Step-by-Step Medical Coding, 2025 Edition
suggestedBooks.description: Step-by-Step Medical Coding, 2025 Edition, offers a structured, beginner-friendly approach to mastering medical coding. This comprehensive guide covers ICD-10-CM, CPT, and HCPCS coding systems, with practical exercises and real-world case studies to reinforce learning. Updated with the latest coding guidelines, it’s perfect for students, new coders, and professionals seeking to stay current in this dynamic field. #MedicalCoding #Beginner #ICD10 #CPT #HCPCS

suggestedBooks.title: Anatomy & Physiology for Coders
suggestedBooks.description: Anatomy & Physiology for Coders is a targeted guide designed to strengthen the foundational knowledge critical for accurate medical coding. This book breaks down complex anatomical and physiological concepts into coder-friendly explanations, with clear diagrams and practical applications. Ideal for coding students and professionals, it bridges the gap between medical science and coding accuracy, enhancing proficiency in ICD-10 and CPT coding. #Anatomy #Physiology #MedicalCoding #CoderEducation #Healthcare

suggestedBooks.title: Medical Terminology For Dummies
suggestedBooks.description: Medical Terminology For Dummies is an engaging and accessible guide to mastering the language of healthcare. Perfect for beginners and professionals alike, this book simplifies complex medical terms through clear explanations, examples, and memory aids. Covering prefixes, suffixes, and root words, it equips coders, billers, and healthcare workers with the vocabulary needed for accurate documentation and communication. #MedicalTerminology #Healthcare #Beginner #CoderEducation #ForDummies

suggestedBooks.title: ICD-10-PCS: An Applied Approach
suggestedBooks.description: ICD-10-PCS: An Applied Approach is the go-to resource for mastering inpatient procedural coding. This guide provides a clear, step-by-step framework for understanding ICD-10-PCS codes, with practical examples and exercises tailored to hospital-based coding. Updated with the latest code sets, it’s an essential tool for coders, clinical documentation specialists, and healthcare professionals aiming for precision in inpatient reimbursement. #ICD10PCS #InpatientCoding #MedicalCoding #HospitalCoding #CDI

suggestedBooks.title: Risk Adjustment Documentation & Coding
suggestedBooks.description: Risk Adjustment Documentation & Coding offers an in-depth exploration of Hierarchical Condition Category (HCC) coding and risk adjustment models. This book provides practical guidance on accurate documentation and coding to support risk-based reimbursement systems. With case studies, compliance tips, and strategies for optimizing RAF scores, it’s a vital resource for coders, auditors, and healthcare administrators in value-based care settings. #RiskAdjustment #HCC #MedicalCoding #Compliance #ValueBasedCare

suggestedBooks.title: The Medical Auditing Handbook
suggestedBooks.description: The Medical Auditing Handbook is a comprehensive guide to mastering the art and science of medical coding audits. Covering auditing principles, compliance regulations, and error detection techniques, this book equips coders and auditors with the tools to ensure accuracy and mitigate risks. With practical examples and step-by-step processes, it’s ideal for professionals seeking to uphold coding integrity and optimize reimbursement. #MedicalAuditing #Compliance #MedicalCoding #AuditPrinciples #Healthcare

suggestedBooks.title: Healthcare Compliance Professional's Manual
suggestedBooks.description: The Healthcare Compliance Professional's Manual is an authoritative guide to navigating the complex landscape of healthcare regulations. Covering topics like HIPAA, fraud prevention, and coding compliance, this manual provides practical strategies for ensuring adherence to federal and payer guidelines. Perfect for compliance officers, coders, and administrators, it’s a critical resource for maintaining ethical and legal standards in healthcare operations. #HealthcareCompliance #HIPAA #MedicalCoding #Regulations #ComplianceOfficer

suggestedBooks.title: Evaluation and Management (E/M) Coding
suggestedBooks.description: Evaluation and Management (E/M) Coding demystifies the complexities of E/M code assignment, a critical component of physician reimbursement. This guide offers clear explanations of E/M guidelines, documentation requirements, and coding scenarios, with practical examples to ensure accuracy. Ideal for coders, billers, and providers, it helps maximize reimbursement while maintaining compliance with CMS and AMA standards. #EMCoding #MedicalCoding #PhysicianCoding #Reimbursement #Compliance

suggestedBooks.title: Outpatient CDI and Coding
suggestedBooks.description: Outpatient CDI and Coding focuses on the unique challenges of clinical documentation improvement (CDI) in outpatient settings. This guide provides strategies for enhancing documentation accuracy, ensuring proper code assignment, and optimizing reimbursement. With case studies and practical tips, it’s an essential resource for CDI specialists, coders, and healthcare providers aiming to improve outpatient coding quality. #OutpatientCoding #CDI #MedicalCoding #Documentation #Reimbursement

suggestedBooks.title: Principles of Physician-Based Coding
suggestedBooks.description: Principles of Physician-Based Coding is a specialized guide to professional fee coding for physician services. This book covers CPT, ICD-10-CM, and HCPCS codes, with a focus on accurate code selection for physician practices. With real-world examples and compliance insights, it’s perfect for coders and billers seeking to master E/M, surgical, and diagnostic coding in outpatient settings. #PhysicianCoding #MedicalCoding #CPT #ICD10 #Compliance

suggestedBooks.title: The Revenue Cycle Handbook
suggestedBooks.description: The Revenue Cycle Handbook is a comprehensive guide to mastering the entire revenue cycle management process, from patient registration to claims submission and payment collection. This book offers practical strategies for optimizing billing, coding, and reimbursement while ensuring compliance. Ideal for healthcare administrators, billers, and coders, it’s a must-have for streamlining financial operations in medical practices. #RevenueCycle #MedicalBilling #MedicalCoding #HealthcareManagement #Compliance
